Greetings from Mar Gregorios College of Arts and Science Chennai!

This is Benson Charlie, student coordinator of the Placement Committee of Mgc, Chennai. We are reaching out to corporates, manufacturing , hotel industries, hospitals etc for our Placement Drives (Summer Internship and Final Placements) for MSW ( Hr/ Community organization, Medical and psychiatry)students of our institute.

We would be honoured to have your organization onboard with us.

Feel free to reach out to me at the coordinates mentioned below. Hoping for a positive response from your end.

Thanks and regards,

Benson Charlie

bensoncharlie99@gmail.com

8754566588

Greetings from Training and Placement Cell Department of Management Studies, IIT Dhanbad. I am approaching you on behalf of our placement cell and would like to invite your esteemed organization in the and placement and internship drive for M. Tech IEM, MBA & MBA BA. It would be great if we can connect and discuss more on this or if you can connect me with someone from your organization to discuss the same.
We will be grateful if you please consider my request. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
For further information, we are available at tp_ms@iitism.ac.in
Regards,
Prateek Sarkar
Student Internship Representative
IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
+91 7003032649

Greeting from Training and Placement Cell BIT Sindri !!

Ma'am, I am glad to invite your esteemed organization to the campus placement program for the 2023 pass-out students of our college. Our college is NBA accredited. Last year our college has received excellent responses from recruiters around the globe from companies like Amazon, DE Shaw, Samsung, Infoedge, Deloitte, etc. with 750+ placements (highest package 44 LPA). Students also got off-campus offers for Google, Microsoft, Cisco, etc.

Recently our college has got 2nd rank all over India in AICTE skill assessment.
Ma'am, I request you to kindly help me with your email id or Talent acquisition team so that we can send a formal invitation for the same, along with the recruiter's guide of our institute.

Kindly connect with us at : -
E-mail: tpo@bitsindri.ac.in
Phone: +91 94310 94733

With regards
Ankit kumar
Email: ankitkumar5049@gmail.com
Phone : +91 7903888878

You can reach us at placement@bit-bangalore.edu.in and bitplacement@yahoo.com.

Training and Placement Cell,

Sir, I am glad to invite your esteemed organization to the campus placement program for the 2023 pass-out students of our college. Our college is NBA accredited. Last year our college has received excellent responses from recruiters around the globe from companies like Amazon, DE Shaw, Samsung, Infoedge, Deloitte, etc. with 750+ placements (highest package 44 LPA). Students also got off-campus offers for Google, Microsoft, Cisco, etc.

Recently our college has got 2nd rank all over India in AICTE skill assessment.
Sir, I request you to kindly help me with your email id or Talent acquisition team so that we can send a formal invitation for the same, along with the recruiter's guide of our institute.

Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University, Delhi 

We would like to extend a warm invitation and to connect with your esteemed organization for Campus Recruitment and Internship Drive. For hiring freshers B.Tech/M.Tech from 2022-2023 batch.

Warm Greetings..!!

With immense pleasure, we would like to introduce our institution, Jawaharlal Nehru Engineering College, Aurangabad, a constituent college of MGM University. We are a pioneer with four decades of excellence in Education, Research, and Service offering AICTE approved programs; B.Tech, M.Tech, MCA and Ph.D.

We invite your esteemed organization for the Campus recruitment drive for Engineering Batch. It will be our pride to collaborate with you.

You may please email us your requirements to univplacementoffice@mgmu.ac.in

We look forward to a mutually beneficial and long-lasting association with your organization.

Thanks & Warm regards,

Dr. Parminder Kaur Dhingra
